mapper.select: SELECT A.id, A.user_id, A.program_id, A.application_form, A.status, U.name, U.student_id, U.phone, U.email, U.department, U.major1, U.student_class, U.semester FROM swap.Applicant as A JOIN swap.User as U ON A.user_id = U.id where U.deldate is null and A.program_id = #{id} order by U.name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Applicant (user_id, program_id, application_form) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{program_id}, #{application_form})
